channel.title: First time poster
channel.description:
Hi, I searched for this on google, but it didn't turn up any sources whatsoever, and i searched through a few pages on this forum but couldn't find it either. anyway, the game will load up and run as fine as expected, but then this message will pop up "the instruction at 0x67071dac refrenced memory at 0x17750000 the memory could not be read"
Win 7 SP1
[url]https://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2o2rt&s=6[/url]
This is a snap of the message [url]https://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=30maiky&s=6[/url]
I am dying to play this game, any help would be appreciated.

item.title: First time poster
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Yes. You will need that.

Read full topic

item.title: First time poster
item.dc:creator: Ani_mate
item.description:
Also, I just read this on the information page, “This total conversion will not require Half-Life: Source to play - only the Source SDK Base 2007 which is available for free on Steam.” and I’m not running this on steam, I installed directly to PC. Although I have a partitioned drive, and not enough space on the drive I’m running windows off of, so that’s another strong possibility. I also probably should have mentioned this the first post.

Read full topic

item.title: First time poster
item.dc:creator: Ani_mate
item.description:
Cheerios4606:

This help you at all?
https://helpdeskgeek.com/help-desk/instruction-at-referenced-memory-could-not-be-read/

I finally got a chance to check this, thank you so much, it looks perfect, I’ll try some of the methods and see if I can’t get this awesome game to work.

Read full topic

item.title: First time poster
item.dc:creator: Ani_mate
item.description:
imadoofus:

Welcome to the forums! You don’t need the html for images, just the URL (including the https://)

Thank you, I was wondering why it wasn’t working

Read full topic
